expo.name: WasteRoute

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to show your position on the map and provide turn-by-turn navigation to collection stops. This helps optimize your route and provides real-time progress updates.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Background location allows for continuous navigation between stops when the app is minimized, ensuring you stay on your optimized route. This data is not stored long-term or shared with third parties.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Background location allows for continuous navigation between stops when the app is minimized, ensuring you stay on your optimized route. This data is not stored long-term or shared with third parties.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Photos are used only for setting your profile picture, which helps team members identify you on the Waste Route platform. Your photos are never shared with third parties.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photos are used only for setting your profile picture, which helps team members identify you on the Waste Route platform. Your photos are never shared with third parties.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: WasteRoute uses Face ID for secure authentication to protect your account and route data.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Background location allows for continuous navigation between stops when the app is minimized, ensuring you stay on your optimized route. This data is not stored long-term or shared with third parties.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Background location allows for continuous navigation between stops when the app is minimized, ensuring you stay on your optimized route. This data is not stored long-term or shared with third parties.

expo.description: Route management for waste collection services
